name: College of Lore
description: Bards of the College of Lore collect knowledge from everywhere, using their tales to reveal truth and expose corruption.

3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3.description: Gain proficiency with three skills of your choice.

3.name: Cutting Words
3.description: Use your reaction to expend a Bardic Inspiration, rolling the die and subtracting the number from a creature's attack roll, ability check, or damage roll within 60 feet.

6.name: Additional Magical Secrets
6.description: Learn two spells from any class. They count as bard spells for you and don't count against the number of bard spells you know.

14.name: Peerless Skill
14.description: When you make an ability check, expend a Bardic Inspiration die and add it to the roll. You can decide after seeing the d20 but before the DM determines success.
